Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Voltage fluctuation in primary bus system. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 14/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
